Title: "Americano"
receipe: "A classic coffee made with hot water and a shot of espresso. Simple, yet satisfying.(A.K.A. Up All Night Recovery)"

Title: "Cafe Latte 350 Ml"
receipe: "Smooth, creamy coffee made with steamed milk and a shot of espresso. Perfect for those who prefer a milder coffee taste."

Title: "Cafe Mocha"
receipe: "A delicious blend of milk coffee and special dark cocoa from Madagascar. Indulge in the velvety texture of steamed milk and the intense flavor of cocoa."

Title: "Cappucino"
receipe: "Smooth, creamy coffee made with steamed milk and a shot of espresso. Perfect for those who prefer a milder coffee taste."

Title: "Double Restritto 44 Ml"
receipe: "A traditional Indian coffee made with a unique blend of roasted coffee beans and chicory, served with frothy milk. A rich, flavorful brew that will transport you to the streets of South India."

Title: "Espresso"
receipe: "Bold, aromatic espresso shot that's sure to awaken your senses. This 30ml "Wake Me Up" Coffee Shot is perfect for an energizing start to your day."

Title: "Flat White 250 Ml"
receipe: "A smooth and velvety coffee made with a double shot of espresso and steamed milk. Experience the perfect balance of rich espresso and silky milk."

Title: "Irish Americano"
receipe: "Our Irish Americano is a bold and satisfying drink that's perfect for any time of day. Featuring a double shot of rich espresso, this drink is served with warm water and a touch of sweet Irish syrup for a delightful balance of bitterness and sweetness. Order now to experience the perfect pick-me-up with a touch of Irish sweetness."

Title: "Kaapicino"
receipe: "A fusion of traditional South Indian filter coffee and frothy cappuccino. Experience the best of both worlds in every sip."

Title: "Sea Salt Dark Mocha"
receipe: "Our Sea Salt Dark Mocha is a delicious blend of milk coffee and special cocoa sourced from Madagascar, savored with Konkan coastal sea salt. The unique combination of rich, dark cocoa and sea salt creates a flavor profile that's both savory and sweet. Enjoy the velvety texture of steamed milk and the complex flavors of this indulgent drink."

Title: "South Indian Filter Kaapi"
receipe: "A traditional Indian coffee made with a unique blend of roasted coffee beans and chicory, served with frothy milk. A rich, flavorful brew that will transport you to the streets of South India."

Title: "Hot Chocolate"
receipe: "Discover the unique flavors of our Matcha Frappe, made with green tea powder, milk, and ice, blended to perfection"

Title: "Madagascar Hot Chocolate"
receipe: "Discover the unique flavors of bestselling hot choclate with rich cocoa falvour"

Title: "Almond Frappe"
receipe: "Looking for a refreshing and lactose-free beat-the-heat solution? Our Almond Frappe is the perfect answer! Made with creamy almond milk, this indulgent treat is blended to perfection with ice for a smooth and satisfying texture. Whether you're dairy-free or just looking for a new twist on your usual iced coffee, our Almond Frappe is sure to hit the spot. Order now and savor the deliciousness!"

Title: "Bon Bon"
receipe: "The perfect coffee indulgence for those who love a touch of sweetness. Our expertly crafted coffee is paired with a generous drizzle of condensed milk, creating a delectable combination of flavors that will satisfy any craving. Indulge in the rich and creamy texture of our Bon Bon and experience a little taste of heaven in every sip."

Title: "Classic frappe"
receipe: "Our Classic Frappe is a delicious blend of coffee, milk, and ice that's perfect for any time of day. It's a creamy and refreshing drink that's a must-try for coffee lovers. Get your caffeine fix with this classic beverage."

Title: "hazelnut frappe"
receipe: "Indulge in the nutty and creamy flavors of our Hazelnut Frappe. Made with a blend of coffee, hazelnut syrup, milk, and ice, this drink is drizzled with caramel sauce and is a perfect treat to satisfy your cravings. Order now to experience the perfect blend of flavors."

Title: "Iced americano"
receipe: "Our Iced Americano is a refreshing and straightforward drink made with espresso and cold water poured over ice. It's a perfect pick-me-up on a hot day."

Title: "iced latte"
receipe: "Our Iced Americano is a refreshing and straightforward drink made with espresso and cold water poured over ice. It's a perfect pick-me-up on a hot day."

Title: "Madagascar Chocochip Frappe"
receipe: "Satisfy your chocolate cravings with our Madagascar ChocoChip Frappe. Made with a blend of coffee, chocolate syrup, milk, and ice, this drink is topped with chocolate chips for an added crunch. Order now to indulge in this chocolatey"

Title: "Nariyal Irish Cream Frappe"
receipe: "Treat yourself to the perfect blend of tender coconut and premium coffee with our Nariyal Irish Cream Frappe! This refreshing beverage is blended to precision for a smooth and creamy texture that will tantalize your taste buds. Order now to experience the tropical paradise in a cup."

Title: "Origanal South Indian Frappe"
receipe: "Experience the best of South India with our Original South India Frappe - a modern twist on the classic filter kaapi. We start with the finest quality coffee beans sourced from the region and carefully filter them to create a rich and aromatic base. Our expert baristas then blend this traditional filter kaapi with ice, milk and a touch of sweetness for a truly indulgent frappe experience."

Title: "Vietnamese"
receipe: "Savor the rich and bold flavors of our Vietnamese coffee. Made with strong coffee and sweetened condensed milk, this iced beverage is a must-try for coffee aficionados. Order now to experience the authentic taste of Vietnam."
